results.title: Holeproof Antz Pantz [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
A commercial for Holeproof Antz Pantz featuring an echidna called Rex. The ad caused some heated debate when first aired. in the late 1980s.
Produced by Campaign Palace.

results.title: Yellow Pages: Goggomobil [advertisement]
results.brief_description: Tommy Dysart stars as the man searching through the Yellow Pages business telephone directory for a mechanic who can help his beloved, a rare ‘Goggomobil’ car from the 1950s (‘not the Dart’).

results.title: Holeproof Computer Socks [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
A commercial for Holeproof ‘Computer Socks’ set in a patent office, where the inventor’s glee at his discovery (‘they fall up, not down’) causes Isaac Newton to rethink his theory of gravity.
Produced by Campaign Palace.

results.title: Australian tourism [advertisement]
results.brief_description: Developed by Mojo MDA for the Australian Tourism Commission this advertisement was part of the ‘come and say g’day’ campaign and features Paul Hogan in a range of locations across Australia. It also uses a range of Australian slang expressions including a play on the famous expression ‘put another prawn on the barbie’.

results.title: AFL: I'd like to see that [advertisement] 1996
results.brief_description: Produced in 1996 to commemorate the Centenary of Australian Rules Football this ad features international celebrities John Lee Hooker (musician), Heather Locklear (actress), Archbishop Desmond Tutu (religious leader) and George Burns (comedian). Produced by Campaign Palace.
